full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: General Contractor Services

#### Invitation to Qualify
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in the selection process for the design, construction, and completion of a new High Commission of Canada in Colombo, Sri Lanka. 

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4312155674
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4312155674
* **Publication Date**: November 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: December 15, 2023, 14:00 (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 21, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: No end date specified
* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding

#### Trade Agreements

* The tender is open to bidders who meet the requirements of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**: 
    * Address: 11 Lauier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
    * Contact: Patrick Sullivan, [patrick.sullivan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.sullivan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Required Documents

* A complete bid, including all required supporting documentation, must be submitted by the tender closing date and time. Late bids will not be accepted.

#### Notice and Selection Criteria

* Please note the amendment to the tender closing date and time. For further information and the official tender notice, please refer to the tender notice hosted on Ariba Discovery, accessible via this link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18067031?extsite=MTgwNjcwMzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18067031?extsite=MTgwNjcwMzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
